articles.title: SKUAST-Jammu inks MoU with KNU of South Korea
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Sept 30: For global academic excellence, Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences & Technology of Jammu (SKUAST-J) has inked a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Kangwon National University (KNU) of Chuncheon, South Korea. The landmark agreement, formalized by Prof B N Tripathi, Vice Chancellor, SKUAST-Jammu and Prof Jeong Jaeyeon, President of Kangwon National University, Chuncheon, South Korea aims to foster robust collaboration in key areas including to promote academic and educational exchanges, faculties and students exchange program and […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Sept 30: For global academic excellence, Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences & Technology of Jammu (SKUAST-J) has inked a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Kangwon National University (KNU) of Chunch... [2131 chars]

articles.title: Now a security ‘threat’, Wangchuk was Govt’s expert for all seasons
articles.description: Sonam Wangchuk, a renowned education reformer, climate activist, and technology innovator, was arrested under the NSA for allegedly inciting violent protests in Ladakh. However, he was still sought after by government offices for his expertise in water conservation, clean energy, and tourism.

articles.title: Nitin Gadkari inaugurates New Sheevam Netralaya
articles.description: on the occasion of world retina day and the auspicious navratri, union minister for road transport and highways nitin gadkari inaugurated new sheevam netralaya, a state-of-the-art super speciality retina and eye hospital, at av medicare, chhatrapati square, wardha road. the hospital is equipped with advanced machinery and cutting-edge technology to provide comprehensive eye care, with a special emphasis on the diagnosis and treatment of retinal disorders.
articles.content:
Business Reporter :
On The occasion of World Retina Day and the auspicious Navratri, Union Minister for Road Transport and Highways Nitin Gadkari inaugurated New Sheevam Netralaya, a state-of-the-art Super Speciality Retina and Eye Hospital, at AV Me... [661 chars]

articles.title: Hirde, Agrawal, Rathod clinch chess titles
articles.description: anvi hirde clinched the under-14 girls chess title with 5 ½ points while nrutya gurve stood second with five in the district sports office organised division-level chess tournament under the aegis of directorate of sports and youth services, pune in association with the gh raisoni sports and cultural foundation and chess association nagpur at raisoni institute of information and technology, shraddha park, hingna. in under under-17 girls, riddhi agrawal won the championship and shraddha bajaj finished second
articles.content:
